data.name: Privacy
data.detailed_description:
A narrative adventure set in a Dutch countryside villa





In the summer of 2079, you are sent to the home of Robert-Paul den Heer, a billionaire CEO who is recently deceased. As you approach the lavish villa, your boss calls to remind you of your task: secure Mr. Den Heer's latest research. Hubert, the house AI, has been informed of your arrival and will assist you in retrieving the files. This job will be easy.

Except it's not.

Hubert discovers that his programming has been tampered with, preventing him from even allowing you into the office. Soon, you find yourself going through personal items in an attempt to find, well, something - anything that may grant you access to the files.

As you dig deeper, you slowly piece together a series of events that shaped Mr. Den Heer's past, our present... and more.

Features


A Rich Story
Explore a richly detailed modernist villa, fully realized in stunning 4K graphics. Interact with Hubert and open doors and drawers to uncover the story of a driven entrepreneur-inventor and the events that made him who he was.

A Vision of the Future
Experience a vision of the future where artificial intelligence and augmented reality have largely replaced the electronics devices we use today. Smartphones, televisions and desktop computers - all are rendered obsolete in the future portrayed in Privacy.

A Narrative Experience
Privacy is a narrative-focused game. Unravel the secrets of the house and story at your own pace. Depending on how deep you dig, Privacy will take between 2 and 5 hours to complete.

data.short_description: Privacy is a narrative adventure set in a Dutch countryside villa. Explore the home of deceased billionaire Robert-Paul den Heer to piece together events that shaped his past, our present... and more.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Dutch
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 5th Generation (Broadwell) Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.11 (El Capitan) or newer
  • Processor: 2015 or newer Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal compatible GPU
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit OS
  • Processor: 2015 or newer Intel Core i3 or AMD A-Series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible GPU with at least 2GB memory
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
